member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure
member.summary: Data collection containing all parameters needed to execute a dispense sequence.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor of a new dispense procedure without any information inside.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor of a new dispense procedure without any information inside.
member.param: Name of the dispense procedure as unique identifier

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.Similar(Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure)
member.summary: Compares this dispense procedure with the specified one. Only washer specific items are compared in opposite to the method Equals() whereas also members of the base class are compared.
member.returns: True if all items are equal

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.Name
member.summary:
Name of the dispense procedure.
(The property ObjectName of SObject is used behind this property.)

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.CustomizationFilter
member.summary:
Name of an optionally used filter to customize the amount of procedure parameters.
Without a name, the default setting will be used.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.Options
member.summary: Options for a dispense procedure

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.StartPower
member.summary: Power mode of the pump at start of a dispense procedure.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.StartPosition
member.summary: Position where procedure has to start.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.DelayAfterMove
member.summary: Time between start of dispense and start of first movement in milliseconds

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.AspiratePower
member.summary: Power mode of the aspirate pump while dispense.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.DispenseSteps
member.summary: Collection of dispense steps

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.OptionValue
member.summary: Dispense procedure option values\n

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.OptionValue.IsInvalid
member.summary: This Option bit marks the procedure as invalid.
member.remarks: This is mainly used for firmware compatibility. In wash program editor it will typically not be used.

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure.OptionValue.AspirateWhileDispense
member.summary:
Aspirate while dispense
This option activates the aspirate pumpe while executing the dispense procedure. Important: This flag will be overwritten by the same flags of the dispense wash steps while step execution.

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedures
member.summary: Collection of dispense procedures.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedures.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedures.Add(Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedure)
member.summary:
Adds a SWashDispenseProcedure object to the collection
An already existing dispense procedure with the same name will be overwritten.
member.param: The SWashDispenseProcedure object to be inserted
member.returns: Index of the newly inserted procedure

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedures.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Find an dispense procedure based on their name.
member.returns: The dispense procedure looked for

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedures.FindPosition(System.String)
member.summary: Find list index of an dispense procedure based on their name.
member.returns: The list index of the dispense procedure looked for

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedures.Item(System.String)
member.summary:
String Indexer. Gets or sets the SWashDispenseProcedure object with the given name.
If the procedure is not found in the collection the get indexer will return null and the set indexer will do nothing.
member.returns: The SWashDispenseProcedure with the given name or null if the name is not known

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashDispenseProcedures.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Indexer. Gets or sets the SWashDispenseProcedure object at the given index.
If the index is not within the bounds of the collection the get indexer will return null and the set indexer will do nothing.
member.returns: The SWashDispenseProcedure at the given index or null if the index is out of bounds

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager
member.summary: The SWashManager is responsible for loading and storing wash programs and provide them to the washer device driver. It also provides an editor dialog to create and modify these programs.

member.summary: Wash program repository

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.error
member.summary: Error status of the manager

member.summary: The one and only wash program manager

member.summary: Lock object, used to synchronize calls in a multi threading environment

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.filePath
member.summary: Contains the path information if an xml file is loaded.

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.fileName
member.summary: Contains the file or database name of the data source.

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.providePropertyGrid
member.summary:
Set this flag to true in order that the wash program editor provides the wash program data in a property grid also.
The flag is set to false as default.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.GetErrorInfos
member.summary: This interface function returns the default error messages which can be generated by this device.

member.summary: Creates a new SWashManager object

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.GetManager
member.summary:
Instantiator/Factory method
This static method gets the one and only wash program manager. If no wash program manager is available yet, a new wash program manager instance will get created.
member.returns: The one and only wash program manager

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.IsFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the given wash program data has to be loaded from file or from db
member.returns: True if name has to be loaded from file, otherwise false.

member.summary: create a full load path from given file name
member.returns: A full path to the file

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.SavePath(System.String)
member.summary: create a full save path from given file name
member.returns: A full path to the file

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.DoOverwrite(System.String,System.String,Sias.Core.SSaveOptions)
member.summary: Returns true if an existing object is allowed to be overwritten.
member.param: The type of the object (File, Wash Program Repository)
member.returns: True if allowed to overwrite otherwise false

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.Load(System.String)
member.summary:
Load wash program repository
This method loads the whole program repository from database or from a file.
 If the given name is a file name (recognized either by an appended ".xml" or by a leading file path) the wash program repository get loaded from the file.
 Otherwise the wash program repository get loaded from db.
   IMPORTANT: All origin wash program data get removed!

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.Load
member.summary: Load default wash program repository

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.Save(System.String,Sias.Core.SSaveOptions)
member.summary: Save wash program repository to file or database
member.param: The name of the file to store
member.returns: true is successfully saved, otherwise false

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Store wash program repository at default location (with overwriting)
member.param: The name of the file to store
member.returns: true is successfully saved, otherwise false

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashManager.Save
member.summary: Store wash program repository at default location (with overwriting)
member.returns: true is successfully saved, otherwise false

member.summary: Disables and clears the fields of the aspirate procedure. This is used in case no aspirate procedure is selected.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.GUI.SWashProgramEditor.EnableDispenseProcedureFields

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.GUI.SWashProgramEditor.DisableDispenseProcedureFields
member.summary: Disables and clears the fields of the dispense procedure. This is used in case no dispense procedure is selected.

Prime delay
Time in milli seconds the suck pump still works after the dispens pump has stopped.

member.summary: This Option bit marks the program as invalid.

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramRepository
member.summary:
Top container containing all available WashPrograms.
This may change since these wash program are intended for use by drivers whereas the program structure used by the editor may differ. It is planed to store only programs as used by the editor while program data used by the washer device drivers is build each time requested.

member.summary: Collection containing all aspirate procedures known by the wash program manager.

member.summary: Liquid index identifying the source of the wash buffer.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashProgram.Cycles
member.summary:
Number of cycles
This value defines how many times the wash program has to be performed on the specified rows. The prime procedure is not affected by this counter.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashProgram.MinPlateCycleTime
member.summary:
Minimum time between startings of succeeding wash cycles.
A wash cycle will wait at least this number of seconds from the last start of a cycle to the succeeding start.

member.summary: Contains the information used to prime the washer prior to a wash program.

Collection of row procedures.

member.summary: Name of the final aspirate procdure to empty the layout item washed by this procedure.

Simultate unused rows

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice
member.summary:
Washer device interface
This interface provides the minimum methods a washer device has to implement as far has it is able to work with dynamic loaded wash programs.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.CheckWashProgram(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData)
member.summary:
Check wash program.
This method forces the washer device driver to check the given wash program. The method will report errors to the error manager.
member.remarks: \b Important: This method overwrites the tranfer memory of the dynamic washer devcice!
member.param: The program data block of the wash program to check.
member.returns: The Result of check, 0 if the wash program is correctly

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.DeleteWashProgram(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Delete wash program from flash memory
This method forces the washer device driver to delete a wash program in flash memory. The wash program gets identified by its .
member.param: The wash program index to load (9..127).
member.returns: The Result of the operation, 0 if the wash program is deleted

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.GetWashProgramFromWasher
member.summary:
Get wash program from washer
This method gets the wash program from washers transfer memory.
member.returns: The actual wash program.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.GetWashProgramFromWasher(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Get a wash program from the washer device
This method gets the specified wash program from the washer device.
member.param: The index of the wash program looked for:\n - 0: wash program in RAM - 1..8: wash program from config memory - 9..127: wash program from flash pool
member.returns: The wash program stored at the given position (index).

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.SendWashProgramToWasher(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData,Sias.Core.Interfaces.IItem)
member.summary:
Transfer wash program to washer transfer memory.
This method sends the defined wash program together with the plate definitions of the given plate to the washer (in RAM section).
member.param: The item where to get the wash positions.\n If this parameter is null the item currently placed on the washer slot has to be used.
member.returns: True if wash program successfully sent, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.SendWashProgramToWasher(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData,Sias.Core.Interfaces.IItem,System.Byte)
member.summary:
Transfer wash program into the specified place of the flash pool.
This method sends the defined wash program together with the plate definitions of the given plate to the washer into the specified place.
member.param: The item where to get the wash positions.\n If this parameter is null the item currently placed on the washer slot has to be used.
Wash program index to store (only flash indexes: 9..127)
member.returns: True if wash program successfully sent, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.StartPrime(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Int16,System.Int16,Sias.WashManager.SPowerModeValue)
member.summary:
Start prime procedure.
This command starts a prime procedure with the given parameters.
member.param: Liquid index identifying the source of the wash buffer
Volume used in one prime cycle
Delay in milli seconds the suck pump still works after the dispens pump has stopped.
Power mode of the pump during the prime cycles

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.StartPrime(System.Byte,Sias.WashManager.SWashPrimeProcedure)
member.summary:
Start prime procedure.
This command starts a prime procedure using a predefined SWashPrimeProcedure data structure.
member.param: Liquid index identifying the source of the wash buffer
Data collection containing all parameters needed to execute a prime procedure

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.StartWash(System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary:
Start wash program command.
This command starts the washer with the specified wash program.
member.param: The index of wash program to get started:\n - 0: wash program in RAM - 1..8: wash program from config memory - 9..127: wash program from flash pool
Rows to be washed (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some Washers may not support individual row washing.\n In this case the Washer may wash unselected rows also.
member.remarks: \b Important: Not all washer devices will support this method!

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.StartWash(System.Byte,Sias.Core.Interfaces.IItem,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary:
Start wash program command.
This command starts the washer with the specified wash program.
member.param: The index of wash program to get started:\n - 0: wash program in RAM - 1..8: wash program from config memory - 9..127: wash program from flash pool
The item where to get the wash positions.\n
Rows to be washed (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some Washers may not support individual row washing.\n In this case the Washer may wash unselected rows also.
member.remarks: \b Important: Not all washer devices will support this method!

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.StartWash(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary:
Start wash program command.
This command starts the washer with the specified wash program.
member.param: Rows to be washed (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some Washers may not support individual row washing.\n In this case the Washer may wash unselected rows also.

member.param: The item where to get the wash positions.\n
Rows to be washed (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some Washers may not support individual row washing.\n In this case the Washer may wash unselected rows also.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.StopWash
member.summary:
Stop a running wash program.
Stops an already but still not finished wash program.
member.remarks: \b Important: Not all washer devices will support wash program interruption!

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.WaitForEndOfWashing
member.summary:
Waits for the end of the running wash program.
This method waits infinite until the wash program finishes.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.PauseWash
member.summary:
Pause washing flag
This property is used to pause a wash program. The washer/wash head stops moving, but the wash program did not get aborted. The program can get continued by setting the PauseWash flag back to false.
member.remarks: \b Important: - The PausWash flag gets reset on start of a new wash program. - No each washer device is able to interrupt washing!

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.IWasherDevice.IsWashing
member.summary: Indicator whether a wash program is running.

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep
member.summary: Data collection containing all parameters needed to execute a single aspirate or dispense step.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor to ensure members are instantiated and to enable to clone this object.

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.Similar(Sias.WashManager.SWashStep)
member.summary: Compares this wash step with the specified one. Only washer specific items are compared in opposite to the method Equals() whereas also members of the base class are compared.
member.returns: True if all items are equal

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.Options
member.summary: Options used by one single aspirate or dispense step

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.Power
member.summary: Power mode of the pump during a aspirate or dispense step.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.DestinationPosition
member.summary:
Position where the step has to move.
(Only the x and y coordinates have to be considered.)

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.Speeds
member.summary: Speed in each direction. The position values for x, y and z are used for the moving speed in the corresponding direction.

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.DelayAfterMove
member.summary: Additional delay after movement

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.OptionValue
member.summary: Wash step option values\n

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.OptionValue.IsInvalid
member.summary: This Option bit marks the program as invalid.
member.remarks: This is mainly used for firmware compatibility. In wash program editor it will typically not be used.

member.name: F:Sias.WashManager.SWashStep.OptionValue.AspirateWhileDispense
member.summary:
Aspirate while dispense
This option activates the aspirate pumpe while executing the dispense wash step. The flag is only recogniced in case of dispense wash steps (part of a dispense procedure). The aspirate power is defined at the dispense procedure.

member.name: T:Sias.WashManager.SWashSteps
member.summary: Collection of SWashStep objects.

member.summary: Default constructor

member.summary: Adds a SWashStep object to the collection
member.param: The SWashStep object to be inserted
member.returns: Index of the newly inserted object

member.name: M:Sias.WashManager.SWashSteps.Similar(Sias.WashManager.SWashSteps)
member.summary: Compares this wash step collection with the specified one. Only washer specific items are compared in opposite to the method Equals() whereas also members of the base class are compared.
member.returns: True if all items are equal

member.name: P:Sias.WashManager.SWashSteps.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Indexer. Gets or sets the SWashStep object at the given index. If the index is not within the bounds of the collection the get indexer will return null and the set indexer will do nothing.
member.returns: The SWashStep at the given index or null if the index is out of bounds

A wash program as it is stored in the wash program repository.
